QueryViewSpec.Name: UMHS Duplicate Search Cleanup History Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: History of running the Duplicate Search and Cleanup UMP
QueryViewSpec.Author: UM Dev
QueryViewSpec.RecordType: Deleted MIMED Contacts and Friend (shell) records

TVFImplementation.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_QUERY_UMHS_DUPLICATESEARCHANDCLEANUPHISTORY_LISTBUILDER() returns table as return select MatchesToReview.ID, deletedMatches.MATCHSETID, deletedMatches.[STATUS], deletedMatches.DATEADDED, deletedMatches.DATECHANGED, c.USERNAME, dbo.USR_UM_USR_UFN_UMHS_GETTIMEDURATION(deletedMatches.DATEADDED, deletedMatches.DATECHANGED) DURATION, deletedMatches.MIMEDFRIENDRECORDS, deletedMatches.MIMEDUMHSDATARECORDS, case when MatchesToReview.MIMEDMATCHEDRECORDSTOREVIEW is NULL then 0 else MatchesToReview.MIMEDMATCHEDRECORDSTOREVIEW end MIMEDMATCHEDRECORDSTOREVIEW, deletedMatches.[MESSAGE] from USR_UMHS_DELETEDMATCHEDMIMEDCONTACTSTOUMAFFILIATIONS deletedMatches inner join CHANGEAGENT c on c.ID=deletedMatches.ADDEDBYID left outer join ( select x.ID, x.MATCHSETID, x.DATEADDED MATCHSETREVIEW_DATEADDED, MAX(x.MATCHSETROWNUMBER) MIMEDMATCHEDRECORDSTOREVIEW from ( select row_number() over(partition by m.MATCHSETID order by m.DATEADDED) MATCHSETROWNUMBER, m.* from ( SELECT eval_msets.ID, eval_msets.MATCHSETID, eval_msets.DATEADDED from ( select ID, MATCHSETID, DATEADDED, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MATCHSETID ORDER BY DATEADDED) ROWNUM from USR_UMHS_MATCHEDMIMEDCONTACTSTOUMAFFILIATIONS ) eval_msets where eval_msets.ROWNUM=1 ) m cross apply dbo.USR_UFN_QUERY_UMHS_DUPLICATESEARCHEVALUATION_LISTBUILDER(m.MATCHSETID) ) x group by x.ID, x.MATCHSETID, x.DATEADDED ) MatchesToReview on MatchesToReview.MATCHSETID=deletedMatches.MATCHSETID
